posts.post_title: WTB: T206 American Beauty 350 No Frame
posts.post_content: Upon recent exam of my AB backs, I discovered I don't have a 350/no frame. If any one has a fair/good/vg they maybe willing to sell at a fair price, please lmk. Raw/Graded. Thanks in advance Ralph  [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]
